abstract: After 50 years of studying Moroccan cuisine, she finds an unexpected flood of information.
snippet: After 50 years of studying Moroccan cuisine, she finds an unexpected flood of information.
lead_paragraph: Paula Wolfert has been studying Moroccan food for almost 50 years, but in conversations about her new book, "The Food of Morocco," she said she was unprepared for the flood of information unleashed by the Facebook group she started recently.

headline.main: Paula Wolfert Finds Lots of Love for Morrocan Food on Facebook
